Text: More info about the file itself rather than just a synopsis  of the show would be a lot better description.  Also if you don't RAR the file it can be previewed as it is being downloaded to check the quality. Most people won't D/L a RAR file blindly. Thanks for the upload.
One more tip: it saves almost no space to RAR video. Waste of time on both ends.
